author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
It includes #7086, and then it adds the following fixes to the HLT menu:
- Change in hltBLifeTimeL3FilterCSVsusy, CMSHLT-200
- Migration tau paths to a new L1 menu with L1_IsoTaus, CMSHLT-214
- Remove 'HighQ' from the name of the L1 muon seeds (as for L1 menu v2)
- Updated L1 seeds for hltL1sL1SingleJet36 and hltL1sL1SingleJet16 (use L1_SingleJet36 by now)
- Replaced L1_SingleEG35er with L1_SingleEG35 everywhere
- Update L1 seeds and b-tagging sequence in Double Lepton + HT triggers (plus controls), CMSHLT-216
- Displaced jet triggers, CMSHLT-196
- Allow in GRun paths for the 7e33 menu formerly integrated with CMSHLT-160 and CMSHLT-164
- HLT_PFMETXXX_PFMHTXXX for 7E33 menu, CMSHLT-203
- BPH quarkonia paths for 7E33, CMSHLT-211
- Higgs diphoton paths, CMSHLT-199
- Add L1_DoubleMu0er16_WdEta18 to 5 BPH paths, CMSHLT-229
title: First HLT menu compatible with L1Menu_Collisions2015_25ns_v2
